title: Yaayum Pakkatha Nerathil Song Lyrics From Sagaa Movie
stanzas:
Yaayum niyaayum
yaa..ragiyaro ?
endhaiyum nundhaiyum
emmurai kaelir

sembula
peyalneer pol
anbudai ..
nenjamthaan
kalandhenave..
kalandhenave..

Pakkatha Nerathil parkurathum
kulungi kulungi sirikkiradhum
kannaadi munnadi pesuradhum
kadhal vasappatta arikuriyaa..

Yaayum niyaayum
yaa..ragiyaro ?
endhaiyum nundhaiyum
emmurai kaelir

sembula
peyalneer pol
anbudai ..
nenjamthaan
kalandhenave..
kalandhenave..

paadha theriyaama
nadakkuradhum
siragae illaama
parakkuradhum.

unnoda nenappil
irukkuradhum.
kadhal vasappatta
arikuriyaa!!!

raathookkam illaama
vizhikkiradhum
purandu purandu
padukkuradhum.

kanavu kalanji
muzhikkiradhum.
kaddhal vasappatta
arikuriyaa..

Yaayum niyaayum
yaa..ragiyaro ?
endhaiyum nundhaiyum
emmurai kaelir

seo.title: Yaayum Pakkatha Nerathil Song Lyrics From Sagaa Movie
seo.description: Get the complete Yaayum Pakkatha Nerathil Song Lyrics From Sagaa Movie from Sagaa. Read the lyrics penned by Shabir and composed by Shabir and sung by Naresh Iyer. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Shabir, Sagaa, Shabir, Naresh Iyer, Rita Thiyagarajan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
